title: SkillNinjas
desc: SkillNinjas have come up with the mission to teach the industry-standard skill to young people and prepare them for the job.

title: AltInvest1
desc: Single platform for carrying out end to end process undertaken by start-ups, syndicates/networks & investors for fund raising & investment with process, document and portfolio management.

title: HealthX
desc: HealthX provides a digital care ecosystem, across all OPD and IPD workflows for a doctor. Available over Web, iOS, and Android the platform is integrated into Hospital Information System (HIS), Laboratory Information System (LIS), Radiology Information System (RIS) and Pharmacy Management Systems.

title: MuktiPrime
desc: Mukti Prime is a subscription based OTT Platform with Movie and Series Hosting service. let your audience to manage their playlist and recommends them movies based on their interest
